# Class LLMFactory

Factory class for creating LLM instances. Provides methods to create both local and remote language models.

##### Index

### Methods

createLocal createRemote

## Methods

### `Static`createLocal

  * createLocal(config: [LocalLLMConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_config.LocalLLMConfigInterface)): Promise<[LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)>

Creates a local LLM instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [LocalLLMConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_config.LocalLLMConfigInterface)

Configuration for the local LLM

#### Returns Promise<[LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)>

Promise resolving to a new LLM instance




### `Static`createRemote

  * createRemote(config: [RemoteLLMConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_config.RemoteLLMConfigInterface)): Promise<[LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)>

Creates a remote LLM instance.

#### Parameters

    * config: [RemoteLLMConfigInterface](/interfaces/primitives_llm_config.RemoteLLMConfigInterface)

Configuration for the remote LLM

#### Returns Promise<[LLM](./primitives_llm_llm.LLM)>

Promise resolving to a new LLM instance
